text: Madea's Witness Protection is a comedy-drama movie. It was directed, written, and produced by Tyler Perry. The movie is about Madea taking care of a White American family who are in being protected by the FBI. The movie was filmed from January to March 2012. The movie was released in the United States on June 29, 2012. == Cast == * Eugene Levy as George Needleman * Tyler Perry as Mabel "Madea" Simmons/Joe Simmons/Brian Simmons * Denise Richards as Kate Needleman * Romeo Miller as Jake * Doris Roberts as Barbara Needleman * Tom Arnold as Walter * John Amos as Pastor Nelson * Marla Gibbs as Hattie * Danielle Campbell as Cindy Needleman, * Devan Leos as Howie Needleman, == References == ==Other websites== * Category:2012 movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Lionsgate movies
title: Madea's Witness Protection
